title: Understanding $$t-tests$$
text: A $$t-test$$ is a statistical test used to compare the means of two groups. It helps determine if the differences between the groups are statistically significant.

title: When to use a $$t-test$$
text: Consider using a $$t-test$$ when you have two sets of data and you want to know if their means are significantly different from each other.

hintAnswer: Comparing the means of two sets of data to determine if they are significantly different.
title: Identifying the correct application
text: Which of the following options correctly describes the application of a $$t-test$$ in analytical chemistry?
choices: Determining the standard deviation of a single dataset.
Comparing the means of two sets of data to determine if they are significantly different.
Calculating the median of a dataset.
Finding the mode of a dataset.
